column2: "Ooh, I just love the sound of gunfire and cries of agony thundering across wide-open spaces!"
"And the Floating Continent is the perfect place for that. It's bright and expansive, and the hostiles there are nice and tough."
"I just love a good challenge, don't you? I mean, why even bother if something's not challenging?"
"And besides, we can't sit back and let the enemy have their way. We have to kill them. For the Dragonkin's sake."
"That's why I joined ARKS in the first place. To shoot and kill those Darkers 'til they're all nothing but rotting flesh!"
